children.value: Resonance is a special effect that occurs when you equip specific combinations
of weapons, shields, or bracelets at the same time.
When a resonance effect activates, a message is displayed in the scrolling messages window,
and information about the effect and trigger condition gets added to the Item Book.

Item 1 Item 2 Resonance Effect
Ordinary Stick Plain Targe Equip 2 bracelets
・The second bracelet in your inventory is unequipped if you equip
　another bracelet, or if the resonance effect is no longer active.
・However, if a bracelet is cursed, the other bracelet is unequipped.

※ The resonance effect for the Pathetic Blade and Pathetic Shield
　set changes when they both reach level 8.
Tin Blade Tin Shield
Katana Iron Targe
Beast Fang Beast Shield
Dotanuki Wolfshead
Bladite Targite
Red Blade Red Shield
Extreme Sword Rush Shield
Pathetic Blade Pathetic Shield
Kabura Katana Fuuma Shield Direct attack damage +5
・Also applies to night monsters.
Fuuma Sword
Fuuma Sword Helix Shield Direct attack damage +10
・Also applies to night monsters.
Kaburagi
Dull Gold Edge Gold Shield Max strength +3
Lizard Lasher Snake Shield Weapon and shield strength +3
Myopic Masher Spry Shield
Crescent Katana Blast Shield
Bright Blade Day Shield Read scrolls without light at night
Torches Midnight Shield Evade enemy attacks more often
Breeze Blade Equipped items won't rust
・The Shoddy set will still degrade through usage.
Shoddy Dirk Shoddy Plank
Glass Dirk Glass Buckler Nullifies magic bullets received
Dirk of Debts Pauper's Plank Enemies drop Gitan more often
・Defeated enemies drop 200-399 Gitan about 20% of the time.
・Also applies when you defeat enemies using Flame Shot.
※ Generally negative, since it replaces normal item drops.
Violent Blade Mojo Bracelet Chance to inflict Slow status
Burning Blade Swap Shield Increases flame damage by 1 level
・Blue Flame takes priority if present, increasing flame damage
　to 30 regardless of weapon level. (The flame also turns blue)
Rising Sun Rising Sun Shld Adjacent monsters might step away
Wonder Pick Nirvana Board Max HP +30
Torches Blazing Shield Light up everything on-screen at night
Student Shield Growth Bracelet Doubles bracelet experience points gain
Counter Shield Strength Bracelet Doubles counter damage
Nap Rattle Alert Bracelet Increases chance to inflict Asleep status (+2%)
Baffle Axe Anti-Cnf. Bracelet Increases chance to inflict Confused status (+2%)
True Knife Anti-Parry Brce. Thrown items always hit

export const _frontmatter = {"title":"Resonance","metaTitle":"Resonance - Shiren the Wanderer: Tower of Fortune Wiki","metaDescription":"List of equipment resonance effects for Shiren the Wanderer: The Tower of Fortune and the Dice of Fate."}
